html: 6.30.17  7:10 am   It seems like most of the questions you get are people telling you what to do and what not to do (I might be guilty of having done that once, albeit with good intentions). How do you cope with so many thousands of strangers online bossing you around? How much of it do you ignore for your own choices and how much do you "follow through" to please them?
6.30.17  2:14 am   What's the point of doing anything if everything's already been done?

6.30.17  1:51 am   Bill I need help. If I only have one idea that I think is good and has a lot of potential, but no other ideas, does that mean I am not a creative person? Does it disqualify me from being considered a creative person?

6.30.17  12:05 am   I'm really excited to see a medium video that's not history but something new and exciting and unexplored for you. Do you enjoy having a wide range of topics besides history to cover now?

6.29.17  6:52 pm   What are some cool ways you can substitute an 11th chord into a progression?

     I get you can incorporate them however you want into your own writing... but what about when playing with others? For example, if the chart of a song has a IV chord, would a I11 chord work over the IV in most situations? If you throw a major 6th into a I11 chord, that would esssentially make it a IVmaj9.

abababababbbabbabba bab ab ababba ba baba ba ba bababbababa
6.29.17  2:59 pm   what if it's only one single person sending you all of these asks
6.29.17  2:17 pm   is 17 still the number for you?
6.29.17  1:59 pm   The fashion police outlawed wearing skirts for me. I want to wear skirts though. What do I do?

6.29.17  1:22 pm   i'm at a public library and i don't know what to think. weird little things keep happening like someone coughs, and it sounds like it's over a PA system because of where they are in the room acoustically (i guess). or like, seven different people have been making grunting/groaning/moaning noises, or breathing like zombies. and, there are a lot of people here but not one of them even has a book with them. i keep noticing people looking at me sideways because i can see the whites of their eyes. it mostly just feels like a big waiting room. like, no one seems to be doing anything particularly important to them.
i don't know whether this is bumming me out or if it is making me feel powerful because i get to be in stealth productivity mode.
